TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartPersonalization extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作低階個人化作業。

span.span: Implements low-level personalization operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作執行較低層級個人化作業所需的邏輯。This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations. 雖然類別會管理個人化的高層級的生命週期，它是負責實際實作實體的步驟，來執行特定的個人化動作的類別。Although the class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions. 類別接著會倚賴實作與個人化資訊的基礎資料存放區通訊。The class in turn relies on an implementation of to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information. 如果您使用的預設實作，它會建立的執行個體類別可讓您藉由參考屬性。If you use the default implementation of the , it creates an instance of the class that you can use by referencing the property. 例如，若要存取屬性，您會指定`WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`。For example, to access the property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以及提供的個人化範圍如何影響結果個人化屬性的範例。The following code example shows how the class is used, as well as providing an example of how personalization scope affects the results of personalized properties. 這個範例有五個檔案：This example has five files: - .Aspx 頁面以宣告方式建立兩個 Web 組件區域中，每個都有一個控制項。An .aspx page that declaratively creates two Web Part zones, each with a control. - 使用者控制項稱為`Color.ascx`，可讓使用者變更個人化套用的屬性，根據使用者的授權權限來修改狀態資訊並將輸入共用的範圍的文字背景色彩。A user control called `Color.ascx` that allows a user to change a personalized property that applies a text box background color based on the user's authorization rights to modify state information and to enter shared scope. - 使用者控制項稱為`Persmode.ascx`，指出目前的頁面範圍的是和權限目前使用者已輸入共用的範圍，或修改資料; 它也提供兩個按鈕; 若要變更範圍及重設目前的使用者個人化資訊。A user control called `Persmode.ascx` that indicates what the current page scope is and what rights the current user has to enter shared scope or to modify data; it also provides two buttons; one to change scope and one to reset current user personalization information. - 用來授權使用者的登入控制項。A login control that is used to authorize users. - 包含提供授權使用者修改個人化狀態及輸入共用的範圍的範例 > 一節的 Web.config 檔案。A Web.config file with a section that provides an example of authorizing a user to modify personalization state and to enter shared scope. 下列程式碼會建立與 aspx 頁面和兩個 Web 組件的區域，並且顯示`Color.ascx`和`Persmode.ascx`控制項。The following code creates an aspx page with a and two Web Part zones and displays the `Color.ascx` and `Persmode.ascx` controls. 在頁面載入用來取得目前的使用者資訊的登入頁面。The page loads a login page that is used to get the current user information. 使用 ASP.NET 網站管理工具中[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]建立的使用者存取網頁。Use the ASP.NET Web Site Administration Tool in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] to create users to access the page. 請參閱範例中的使用者授與組態檔中的授權變更範圍，修改狀態資訊的 Web.config 檔案。See the Web.config file for an example of a user granted authorization in the configuration file to change scope and modify state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下列範例程式碼會建立登入頁面。The following example code creates a login page. 成功登入之後，它將重新導向至主要 aspx 頁面。After a successful login, it redirects to the main aspx page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/login.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/login.aspx#5)] 下列範例程式碼是此應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的一部分。The following example code is a portion of the Web.config file for this application. 本節說明如何設定授權的使用者，在此情況下"user2"、 輸入共用的個人化範圍及修改個人化狀態資訊。This section shows how to set authorization for a user, in this case "user2", to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. 它也會顯示在此情況下為"admin"，可以用來允許進入個人的化範圍，以及修改個人化狀態資訊的 「 管理員 」 角色的使用者的角色中的範例。It also shows an example of a role, in this case "admin", that can be used to allow users in the "admin" role to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/web.config#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/web.config#2)] 下列範例程式碼會建立一個使用者控制項，呼叫`Color.ascx`，可讓使用者變更個人化的屬性，在此情況下兩個文字方塊中，根據目前的個人化範圍和授權之使用者的背景色彩.The following example code creates a user control, called `Color.ascx`, that allows the user to change a personalized property, in this case the background color of two text boxes, based on the current personalization scope and the authorization rights of the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/color.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/color.ascx#3)] 下列範例程式碼會建立一個使用者控制項，呼叫`Persmode.ascx`，它會顯示目前的個人化範圍並修改的使用者權限狀態，輸入共用的範圍。The following example code creates a user control, called `Persmode.ascx`, that shows the current personalization scope and the user rights to modify state and to enter shared scope. 它也有重設 按鈕重設目前的個人化狀態。It also has a reset button for resetting the current personalization state. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#4)]

para.span: 類別與密切控制項和其他個人化基礎結構。

span.span: The class works closely with a control and the rest of the personalization infrastructure.

para.span: 個人化的預設實作是非常強大的子系統，應符合您個人化的需求。

span.span: The default implementation of personalization is a very robust subsystem that should meet your personalization needs.

para.span: 在大部分情況下，如果您想要自訂個人化，您可以建立使用的資料提供者為個人化提供者所建立的類別繼承自。

span.span: In most cases, if you want to customize personalization, you can create a data provider for use as a personalization provider by creating a class that inherits from .

para.span: 如果您想要建立個人化子系統明顯不同於所提供的和類別，您應該建立自訂實作由衍生自並加入您自己的自訂邏輯。

span.span: If you want to create a personalization subsystem significantly different from that provided by the and the classes, you should create a custom implementation by deriving from and add your own custom logic.

para.span: 然後建立自訂實作由衍生自、 加入您自己的自訂邏輯，並覆寫方法以傳回您自訂實作。

span.span: Then create a custom implementation by deriving from , add your own custom logic, and override the method to return your custom implementation.

para.span: 因為控制提出要求的個人化基礎結構，透過執行個體，控制項不是直接互動或保存參考實作。

span.span: Because a control makes requests to the personalization infrastructure by way of a instance, the control does not directly interact with or hold references to implementations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager owner) cil managed

span.span: The used to manage the personalization information

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化這個類別的執行個體，並將它與相關聯使控制項個人化作業會執行執行個體。This constructor initializes an instance of this class and associates it with the control on whose behalf the instance will carry out personalization operations.

exception.span: 為 。

span.span: is .

summary.span: 將個人化資料套用至與 執行個體相關聯的 控制項，或套用至指定 執行個體。

span.span: Applies personalization data to either a control associated with the instance, or to a specific instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyPersonalizationState() cil managed

summary.span: 將個人化資料套用至父 控制項。

span.span: Applies personalization data to the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，這個方法會呼叫方法將個人化狀態套用至所提供的 Web 組件控制項的執行個體。If the property is set to `true`, this method calls the method on the instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.

exception.span: 載入基礎資料存放區的個人化狀態之前，嘗試套用該狀態。

span.span: An attempt was made to apply personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.
\- or -

exception.span: 從資料存放區傳回的個人化狀態為 。

span.span: The personalization state returned from the data store was .

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void ApplyPersonalizationState (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyPersonalizationState(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 要套用個人化資料的 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is to be applied.

summary.span: 父 控制項要求時，將個人化資料套用至指定的 控制項。

span.span: Applies personalization data to the specified control when requested to do so by the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法來個人化資料套用至個別-衍生的類別時若要這樣做的父代要求控制項。This method is called to apply personalization data to an individual -derived class when requested to do so by the parent control. 如果屬性設定為`true`，這個方法會呼叫方法將個人化狀態套用至所提供的 Web 組件控制項的執行個體。If the property is set to `true`, this method calls the method on the instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.

exception.span: 嘗試將個人化狀態套用至未受父 管理的 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: An attempt was made to apply personalization state to a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent .

exception.span: 為 。

exception.span: 載入基礎資料存放區的個人化狀態之前，嘗試套用該狀態。

span.span: An attempt was made to apply personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.

span.span: An attempt was made to apply personalization data more than once to the same Web Parts control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanEnterSharedScope As Boolean
public: property bool CanEnterSharedScope { bool get(); };

summary.span: 傳回數值，指出使用者是否獲得授權進入 範圍。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the user is authorized to enter scope.

value.span: 如果使用者獲得授權進入 範圍則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user is authorized to enter scope; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`true`如果使用者已獲授權在輸入範圍。This property returns `true` if the user is authorized in the to enter scope. 第一次呼叫該屬性時，它會判斷使用者的右邊輸入範圍，以及快取資訊。The first time the property is called, it determines the user's right to enter scope and caches the information. 如果字典修改後第一次這個屬性呼叫，變更不會顯示這個屬性的後續呼叫上。If the dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not shown on subsequent calls to this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用屬性。The following code demonstrates using the property. 此程式碼是位於較大程式碼範例的一部分類別描述。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ChangeScope(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub ChangeScope (scope As PersonalizationScope)

param.name: scope
param.span: 目前網頁的新個人化範圍。

span.span: The new personalization scope for the current page.

summary.span: 將目前網頁的 執行個體變更為指定範圍。

span.span: Changes the current page's instance to the scope specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法變更為所指定之新範圍的目前執行之網頁的個人化範圍`newScope`參數。This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter. 這個方法是呼叫所公開的受保護的 helper 方法方法。This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public method. 此受保護的方法可用來處理未來擴充，如果有兩個以上可能的範圍之間切換。This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between. 如果目前的範圍和`newScope`是相同的值，則這個方法會不執行任何作業。If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.

exception.span: 嘗試從 範圍切換至 範圍，但目前使用者沒有進入 範圍的使用者能力。

span.span: If attempting to switch from scope to scope, the current user does not have the user capability to enter scope.

exception.span: 不是 列舉型別的有效成員。

span.span: is not a valid member of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void CopyPersonalizationState (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPartA, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPartB);

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyPersonalizationState(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPartA, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPartB) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub CopyPersonalizationState (webPartA As WebPart, webPartB As WebPart)
protected public: virtual void CopyPersonalizationState(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPartA, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPartB);

param.name: webPartA
param.span: 提供個人化資料的 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: The Web Parts control supplying the personalization data.

param.name: webPartB
param.span: 接收個人化資料的 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: The Web Parts control receiving the personalization data.

summary.span: 擷取一個 Web 組件控制項的個人化狀態，並將其套用至第二個 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: Extracts the personalization state from one Web Parts control and applies it to a second Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取從個人化狀態`webPartA`，並套用至`webPartB`。This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`. 這個方法會假設`webPartA`和`webPartB`類型相同。This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type. 如果 Web 組件控制項控制項，方法會複製個人化狀態子控制項包裝在`webPartA`給子控制項包裝在`webPartB`。If the Web Parts controls are controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`. 複製作業的一部分`webPartB`標示為 「 有所變更 」。As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".

exception.span: 或 是 。

span.span: Either or is .

exception.span: 和 不屬於同一個 。

span.span: and are not of the same .
\- or -

exception.span: 和 同樣為 控制項，但是其中一個或兩者都沒有子控制項。

span.span: and are controls but one or both lack a child control.
\- or -

exception.span: 和 同樣為 控制項，但是其子控制項不屬於同一個 。

span.span: and are controls, but their child controls are not of the same .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Enabled { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Enabled As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 傳回數值，指出是否要求啟用相關聯 控制項的個人化。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the associated control.

value.span: 如果啟用個人化，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if personalization is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出是否要將個人化要求啟用父控制項。This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent control. 請注意，這是細微但重要的差異的意圖和。Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of and . 這個屬性只能設定完成之前控制項的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 在實務上，這表示屬性必須設定在網頁標記中如果應該停用個人化的項目。In practice, this means that the property must be set in the page markup on the element if personalization should be disabled. 或者，可以設定這個屬性期間`PreInit`階段控制項。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the control.

exception.span: 相關聯 控制項的 方法完成之後，會嘗試設定這個屬性值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property value after the associated control's method had completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EnsureEnabled(bool ensureModifiable) cil managed

param.name: ensureModifiable
param.span: 布林值，表示應當執行何種檢查。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.

summary.span: 確認 執行個體已完成初始化，或目前使用者有權修改個人化狀態。

span.span: Ensures that the instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是 helper 方法，用於數種方法，以確保兩種情況之一：This method is a helper method used in several methods to ensure one of two things: - 執行個體已完成初始化 (例如，呼叫方法，它已順利完成)。The instance has completed initialization (for example, the method was called and successfully completed). 這項檢查會`ensureModifiable`參數等於`false`。This check is made if the `ensureModifiable` parameter equals `false`. \-或-\- or - - 目前的使用者有權修改個人化狀態。The current user has rights to modify personalization state. 這項檢查會`ensureModifiable`等於`true`。This check is made if `ensureModifiable` equals `true`. 控制項也會呼叫這個方法中的案例數目：The control also calls this method in a number of cases: - 若要切換顯示模式一般以外的值。To switch the display mode to something other than normal. 目前的使用者必須具有權限可以修改個人化狀態。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 新增、 刪除或移動 Web 組件控制項。To add, delete, or move Web Parts controls. 目前的使用者必須具有權限可以修改個人化狀態。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要連接，請中斷連線，並編輯 Web 組件控制項。To connect, disconnect, and edit Web Parts controls. 目前的使用者必須具有權限可以修改個人化狀態。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要匯出網頁上的 Web 組件控制項。To export the Web Parts controls on a page. 執行個體必須已完成初始化。The instance must have completed initialization. - 若要匯入 Web 組件控制項。To import Web Parts controls. 目前的使用者必須具有權限可以修改個人化狀態。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.

exception.span: 目前使用者沒有修改個人化資訊的權限，或其他檢查失敗。

span.span: The current user does not have rights to modify personalization information, or other checks failed.
\- or -

exception.span: 傳回了 。

span.span: returned .

summary.span: 擷取父 控制項的個人化資料。

span.span: Extracts personalization data from the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，及個人化狀態不會被重設網頁要求期間 (例如當屬性是`false`)，則這個方法會從父擷取個人化資料期間控制其事件。If the property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the parent control during its event. 這個方法會呼叫方法個人化狀態擷取父執行個體控制項。This method calls the method on the instance to extract personalization state from the parent control.

span.span: Extracts personalization data from a Web Parts control when requested to do so by the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，及個人化狀態不會被重設網頁要求期間 (例如當屬性是`false`)，則這個方法會從 Web 組件控制項擷取個人化資料所指定`webPart`。If the property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the Web Parts control specified by `webPart`. 這個方法會呼叫方法個人化狀態擷取所提供的 Web 組件控制項的執行個體。This method calls the method on the instance to extract personalization state from the supplied Web Parts control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual string GetAuthorizationFilter (string webPartID);

Protected Friend Overridable Function GetAuthorizationFilter (webPartID As String) As String
protected public: virtual System::String ^ GetAuthorizationFilter(System::String ^ webPartID);

param.name: webPartID
param.span: 與要擷取篩選相關聯之 Web 組件控制項的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the Web Parts control associated with the filter to be retrieved.

summary.span: 擷取與指定 Web 組件控制項相關聯的授權篩選 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the specified Web Parts control.

returns.span: 指定 Web 組件控制項的授權篩選。

span.span: The authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取的授權篩選條件，如果任何項目，與所識別之 Web 組件控制項相關聯`webPartID`。This method retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the Web Parts control identified by `webPartID`. 會序列化並個人化所管理的每個 Web 組件控制項相關聯`webPartID`參數。Each Web Parts control that is serialized and managed by personalization is associated with a `webPartID` parameter. 在執行階段，網頁的控制項可以篩選頁面上顯示判斷是否已獲授權的每個 Web 組件控制項的控制項。At run time, a page's control can filter the controls displayed on a page by determining whether each Web Parts control is authorized. 此授權資訊會儲存每個 Web 組件控制項相關聯的資料以字串形式。This authorization information is stored as a string in the data associated with each Web Parts control.

exception.span: 為 時，在網頁的生命週期中過早呼叫這個方法，嘗試擷取授權篩選。

span.span: An attempt was made to retrieve an authorization filter when is by calling this method too early in the page life cycle.
\- or -

exception.span: 嘗試擷取授權篩選，但未載入任何個人化狀態。

span.span: An attempt was made to retrieve an authorization filter and no personalization state has been loaded.
\- or

exception.span: 從資料存放區傳回的個人化狀態為 。

span.span: The personalization state returned from the data store was .

exception.span: 為 或空字串 ("")。

span.span: is or an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是用於判斷目前的頁面及範圍組合是否有與它相關聯的個人化資料的便利方法。This is a convenient method for determining whether the current page and scope combination has personalization data associated with it. 就內部而言，這個方法會呼叫上的提供者，以判斷資料是否存在。Internally, the method calls on the provider to determine whether data exists.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property InitialScope As PersonalizationScope

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PersonalizationScope InitialScope { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PersonalizationScope get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PersonalizationScope value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定預設個人化範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets the default personalization scope.

value.span: ，表示相關聯之 的預設個人化範圍。

span.span: The indicating the default personalization scope of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示應該使用父代的預設個人化範圍先前的知識，有關適當的範圍不存在的控制項。This property represents the default personalization scope that should be used for the parent control in the absence of previous knowledge about the proper scope. 如果未明確設定此屬性，則預設傳回範圍。If this property is not explicitly set, it defaults to returning scope. 這個屬性只能設定完成之前控制項的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 在實務上，這表示必須設定在網頁標記中項目。In practice, this means must be set in the page markup on the element. 或者，可以設定這個屬性期間`PreInit`階段控制項。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the control.

exception.span: 相關聯 控制項的 方法完成之後，會嘗試將這個屬性設為目前值以外的其他值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the associated control's method had completed.

exception.span: 嘗試設定 的值，但它不是 列舉型別的成員。

span.span: An attempt was made to set a value of that is not a member of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否已啟用個人化，並成功載入 類別此執行個體的個人化資料。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the class.

value.span: 如果啟用目前 執行個體的個人化，並成功載入個人化資料，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if personalization is enabled for the current instance and personalization data has successfully loaded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 載入個人化資料之前，這個屬性一律會傳回`false`。Prior to loading personalization data, this property will always return `false`. 例如，這個屬性會傳回`false`期間`PreInit`階段。For example, this property will return `false` during the `PreInit` phase. 相關聯之後的方法已成功完成 (期間方法呼叫)，接著會傳回這個屬性`true`。After the associated 's method has successfully completed (during which the method is called), this property will then return `true`. 這個屬性是受保護的可公開存取別名屬性。This property is a publicly accessible alias for the protected property.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property IsInitialized As Boolean
protected: property bool IsInitialized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否已啟用個人化，並成功載入 類別此執行個體的個人化資料。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the class.

value.span: 如果初始化這個執行個體的個人化，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if personalization is initialized for this instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用個人化功能 (如果屬性設定為`true`)、都是初始化之後立即相關聯的方法已順利完成 （在這期間方法呼叫)。If the personalization feature is enabled (if the property is set to `true`), the instance is considered initialized immediately after the associated 's method has successfully completed (during which the method is called). 載入個人化資料之前，這個屬性永遠傳回`false`。Prior to loading personalization data, this property always returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsModifiable As Boolean
public: property bool IsModifiable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出目前使用者是否獲得授權修改狀態資訊。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current user is authorized to modify state information.

value.span: 如果使用者獲得授權修改狀態資訊，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user is authorized to modify state information; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次呼叫此屬性時，它會快取的結果判斷使用者的權限修改個人化狀態。The first time this property is called, it caches the result of determining the user’s right to modify personalization state. 如果字典之後呼叫此屬性的第一次修改時，變更不會反映在後續呼叫這個屬性。If the dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not reflected in subsequent calls to this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用屬性。The following code demonstrates using the property. 此程式碼是位於較大程式碼範例的一部分類別描述。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope Load() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function Load () As PersonalizationScope

summary.span: 初始化個人化。

span.span: Initializes personalization.

returns.span: 父 的 執行個體。

span.span: A instance for the parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是初始化代表父代的個人化資訊的主要進入點控制項。This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent control. 父代期間會呼叫這個方法控制項的方法。This method is called during the parent control's method. 一般來說，如果其父系已停用個人化控制項，將永遠不會呼叫這個方法。Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent control, this method will never be called. 這個方法期間，會發生下列初始化：During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - 預設的個人化提供者或自訂提供者的參考所示網頁標記或屬性，取得。A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the page markup or the property, is obtained. - 提供者會呼叫以判斷使用者功能 () 目前正在執行的使用者。The provider is called to determine the user capabilities () for the currently executing user. - 目前的頁面/使用者/範圍組合的個人化狀態從基礎資料存放區載入提供者 () 和預存內執行個體。The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider () and stored within the instance. - 目前的頁面/使用者/範圍的個人化範圍取決於提供者 ()。The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (). 請注意，這項判斷結果可能是不同的值屬性。Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the property. 從這個方法傳回的範圍值做為值屬性。The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the property. > [!NOTE] > 才會發生的例外狀況，因為未啟用個人化會直接呼叫方法。An exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the method is called directly. 在 ASP.NET 實作中，內部協助程式方法實際上會呼叫來執行負載，並這個 helper 方法以無訊息方式傳回個人化如果尚未啟用頁面。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.

exception.span: 未啟用個人化時，會呼叫這個方法 ( 等於 )。

span.span: This method is called when personalization is not enabled ( equals ).
\- or -

exception.span: 相關聯 的 屬性值為 。

span.span: The value of the property for the associated is .
\- or -

exception.span: 控制項之相關聯 執行個體上的 屬性值為 。

span.span: The value of the property on the control's associated instance is .

exception.span: 已在網頁標記或 屬性中明確設定提供者，但找不到該提供者。

span.span: A provider was explicitly set in either the page markup or the property and the provider could not be found.
\- or -

exception.span: 包含個人化狀態資料的物件為 。

span.span: The object containing the personalization state data is .

exception.span: 載入和還原序列化資料時發生問題。

span.span: A problem occurred while loading and deserializing data.
\- or -

exception.span: 定義組態檔中的個人化提供者時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred in the definition of a personalization provider in the configuration file.

exception.span: 因為找不到預設提供者，或因為嘗試初始化個人化提供者失敗，所以基礎個人化提供者無法初始化。

span.span: The underlying personalization providers failed to initialize because a default provider could not be found or because a failure occurred while attempting to initialize a personalization provider.

Public Overridable Property ProviderName As String

summary.span: 取得或設定個人化的提供者名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the provider name for personalization.
The name of the personalization provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回設定中的頁面上宣告這個屬性的值。This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration. 如果未設定此屬性，它會傳回。If this property was not set, it returns . 在此情況下，頁面會使用組態檔中指定的預設個人化提供者。In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file. 這個屬性只能設定完成之前控制項的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 這表示屬性必須設定網頁宣告中項目。This means the property must be set in the page declaration on the element. 或者，可以設定這個屬性期間`PreInit`階段。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.

exception.span: 控制項的 方法完成之後，會嘗試將這個屬性設為目前值以外的其他值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the control's method has completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResetPersonalizationState() cil managed

summary.span: 重設基礎資料存放區中目前網頁、範圍和使用者的個人化資料。

span.span: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會重設目前的頁面、 範圍和基礎資料存放區中的使用者的個人化資料。This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store. 重設的副作用，目前正在執行的頁面會重新執行由呼叫。As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a call. 請注意這項傳輸重新執行本頁為`GET`要求，不論頁面原始要求的方式。Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested. 在任何時候，就可以呼叫這個方法。This method can be called at any time. 就內部而言，這個方法會呼叫提供者上的方法。Internally, this method calls the method on the provider. 已成功重設資料之後，屬性設定為`true`。After data is successfully reset, the property is set to `true`. 這個屬性由其他地方略過解壓縮的個人化資料，從控制項屬性執行個體，並儲存它，如果資料已經重設。This property is used elsewhere by the instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.

exception.span: 執行個體無法參考有效的個人化提供者。

span.span: The instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 將目前網頁、範圍和使用者的個人化資料儲存至基礎資料存放區。

span.span: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法期間會呼叫控制項的事件。This method is called during the control's event. 就內部而言，這個方法會呼叫提供者上的方法。Internally, the method calls the method on the provider. 嘗試儲存個人化資料，目前正在執行的使用者沒有呼叫的功能時(在目前執行個體) 會導致例外狀況。Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called (within the current instance) results in an exception. 請注意，這會只是 true 如果呼叫受保護的控制直接的方法。Note that this would only be true if the control called the protected method directly. 在 ASP.NET 實作中，內部協助程式方法實際上會呼叫來執行檔案，並這個 helper 方法以無訊息方式傳回如果目前正在執行的使用者沒有權限可以修改資料。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.

exception.span: 目前的使用者沒有稱為 的功能。

span.span: The current user does not have the capability called .
\- or -

exception.span: 執行個體無法參考有效的個人化提供者。

span.span: The instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
\- or -

exception.span: 目前沒有與 執行個體相關聯的個人化提供者。

span.span: No personalization provider is currently associated with the instance.

exception.span: 如果在呼叫 (呼叫 時取得個人化提供者參考) 之前呼叫這個方法，則會發生這種情況。

span.span: This can occur if this method is called prior to calling (the personalization provider reference is obtained during the call to .
\- or -

exception.span: 未載入個人化狀態。

span.span: No personalization state has been loaded.
\- or -

exception.span: 相關聯 的 執行個體為 。

span.span: The instance for the associated is .
\- or -

exception.span: 控制項之相關聯 執行個體上的 屬性值為 。

span.span: The value of the property on the control's associated instance is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As PersonalizationScope

summary.span: 取得父 控制項的目前個人化範圍。

span.span: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent control.

value.span: 執行個體，表示 的範圍。

span.span: A instance indicating the scope of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值一開始根據設定的傳回值方法。This value is initially set based on the value returned from the method. 可以修改這個值，藉由呼叫方法。This value can be modified by calling the method. 請注意，這代表套用和擷取個人化資訊所使用的範圍。Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information. 這個屬性的值可能與不同屬性或方法。The value of this property might differ from the property or the method.

summary.span: 將父 控制項標記為有已變更的個人化資料 ("Dirty")。

span.span: Marks the parent control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 將父 控制項標記為有已變更的個人化資料 ("Dirty")。

span.span: Marks the parent control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，此方法會標示父控制項作為 「 有所變更 」。If the property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent control as "dirty". 實作詳細資料根據控制項的執行個體，這個方法可能會叫用的安全性檢查和程式碼存取安全性權限檢查。Depending on the implementation details of the control's instance of , this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks. 就內部而言，這個方法會呼叫方法。Internally, this method calls the method. 請注意，控制項在內部會追蹤 「 有所變更 」 狀態，並公開管理員透過 「 dirtiness"屬性，而不是透過這個方法。Note that the control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the property rather than through this method.

exception.span: 未載入個人化資料。

span.span: No personalization data has been loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void SetDirty (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDirty(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 要標記為「變更 (Dirty)」的 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".

summary.span: 將指定的 Web 組件控制項標記為有已變更的個人化資料 ("Dirty")。

span.span: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，此方法會標示為 「 有所變更 」 指定的 Web 組件控制項。If the property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty". 實作詳細資料根據控制項的執行個體，這個方法可能會叫用的安全性檢查和程式碼存取安全性權限檢查。Depending on the implementation details of the control's instance of , this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.

exception.span: 嘗試將未受父 管理的 Web 組件控制項標記為「變更 (Dirty)」。

span.span: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent .

exception.span: 未載入個人化資料。

span.span: No personalization data has been loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property bool ShouldResetPersonalizationState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已重設目前網頁的個人化資料 (例如，要求刪除基礎資料存放區中的個人化資料)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).

value.span: 如果已重設目前網頁的個人化狀態，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，代表目前頁面的個人化狀態已重設，且應該略過擷取個人化資料的控制項和後續儲存作業。If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped. 目前，這個屬性會自動設定為`true`個人化基礎結構會由如果方法呼叫。Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the method is called. 請注意，雖然沒有任何限制時可以設定這個屬性，但此屬性必須設定為`true`之前控制項的事件才能發生效用。Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the control's event to have any effect.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ToggleScope() cil managed

summary.span: 將目前網頁的個人化範圍從 切換至 ，或從 切換至 。

span.span: Switches the current page's personalization scope from to or from to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會切換目前正在執行的網頁個人化範圍。This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope. 切換範圍會導致回目前正在執行的網頁。Toggling the scope results in a back to the current executing page. 如果呼叫時匯出或匯入 Web 組件控制項正在進行，這個方法會執行任何作業。This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring. 如果透過已送出的頁面就會發生切換範圍要求`POST`要求，則任何查詢字串值將會保留在傳送期間，如果透過頁面送出查詢字串參數不會保留`GET`要求。If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following code demonstrates using the method. 此程式碼是位於較大程式碼範例的一部分類別描述。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#7)]

exception.span: 嘗試從 範圍切換至 範圍時，目前使用者沒有進入 範圍的使用者能力。

span.span: The current user does not have the user capability to enter scope when attempting to switch from scope to scope.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property UserCapabilities As IDictionary
protected: virtual property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ UserCapabilities { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 從授與目前使用者的 取得使用者能力集合。

span.span: Gets the set of user capabilities from granted to the current user.

value.span: ，包含授與目前使用者的使用者功能集合，如果使用者匿名，則為空 。

span.span: An containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty if the user is anonymous.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前類別包含兩個值，表示使用者的能力：`modifyState`和`enterSharedScope`。Currently the class contains two values indicating a user's capabilities: `modifyState` and `enterSharedScope`. 為了方便使用，可以檢查字典中包含的功能與協助程式屬性和。For ease of use, the capabilities contained within the dictionary can be checked with the helper properties and . 請注意，在已存取上述任一個屬性; 之後變更能力限制如需詳細資訊，請參閱每個屬性的 [描述] 部分。Note the restrictions on changing capabilities after either of these properties have been accessed; for details, see the description section of each property.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartManager As WebPartManager

summary.span: 取得與這個 執行個體相關聯之目前父 控制項的執行個體。

span.span: Gets an instance of the current parent control associated with this instance.
The current parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來判斷與這個執行個體相關聯控制項類別。Use this property to determine the control associated with this instance of the class.
